15g PROTEIN
Air-Fryer Donuts

AIR-FRYER PROTEIN DONUTS

Quick and easy, these air-fryer protein donuts are ready in minutes and pack 15g of protein.

15g
Protein
130
Calories
18m
Total Time
8
Yield

Nutrition per 1 donut

Carbs14g
Fat4g
Fiber2g
Sugar5g
DifficultyEasy

INGREDIENTS

  • 100g self-rising flour
  • 50g vanilla whey protein powder
  • 40g erythritol
  • 1 large egg
  • 80ml unsweetened almond milk
  • 40g plain Greek yogurt

INSTRUCTIONS

1

Preheat Air Fryer

Preheat your air fryer to 175¬∞C (350¬∞F).

2

Mix Ingredients

In a bowl, mix all the ingredients until a dough forms.

3

Shape Donuts

Roll out the dough and cut out donut shapes. Or, for an easier method, roll into balls and poke a hole in the middle.

4

Air Fry

Place the donuts in the air fryer basket in a single layer and cook for 6-8 minutes, flipping halfway through.

5

Cool and Glaze

Let the donuts cool slightly before glazing or adding toppings.

6

Serve

Enjoy your warm, freshly made air-fryer protein donuts.

PRO TIPS

üí°

Store in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 5 days.

üí°

For best results, use a kitchen scale to measure ingredients in grams.

üí°

Let cool completely before storing to prevent sogginess.
